name: Unofficialamongusspaceship
0:
”Alexa, open the spaceship trip”
”Alexa, start the spaceship trip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the spaceship trip
des:
You are spending the weekend in a futuristic spaceship model called “The Skeld”. Your goal as a crewmate in this highly advanced ship is to catch and eject the imposter, who will try to kill all the crewmates living on and repairing the ship. Remember to pay attention to the small details, which later in the story will help you to eject the imposter. Good luck!

What is new:

1.0, Spelling fix part one
 -1.1, Spelling fix part two

2.0, sound effects and expressions part one

!!More to come!!
Please consider giving a rating so that I can know if you like it and to improve the game the best way I can.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
